Title: Un Coeur en Hiver
Writer: Claude Sautet (scenario and dialogue), Jacques Fieschi (scenario and dialogue), Jérôme Tonnerre (scenario collaborator), Yves Ulmann (collaborating writer)
Actors: Daniel Auteuil, Emmanuelle Béart, André Dussollier, Elizabeth Bourgine
Plot: Beautiful violin virtuoso Camille has two obsessions: the music of Ravel, and a friend of her husband's who crafts violins. But his heart seems to be as cold as her playing is passionate.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 16 wins & 11 nominations.
